title: Humanity Part 2 - The Fossil Record
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Comprehensive timeline of human evolution fossils from 7 million years ago to present, with DNA record discoveries

key_insights.why_mostly_skulls: Skulls made to handle impact - last longer than other body parts
key_insights.modern_human_marker: Teeth mark the true shift into modern type of humans
key_insights.evolution_misconception: Not 'evolving to eventually become us' - Species mixing, mutants, recombination, new immune systems/teeth/brain capacity

pit_of_bones_spain.significance: Oldest traces of DNA found in ancient person that exists in people today

mitochondrial_eve.concept: Theoretical mother of humanity found by looking into human genome
mitochondrial_eve.application: Allowed mapping of human migration patterns
mitochondrial_eve.cataclysm_markers: Small populations indicate limited mate choices at certain times

denisovan_discovery.finding: Denisovan DNA had traces of modern human DNA

tianyuan_cave.finding: People in Asia related to Native Americans

400000_to_450000_years.name: Spanish DNA from Pit of Bones

stereotypical_neanderthal.note: This is the stereotypical Neanderthal Cave Man that you think of

quiz_questions.q: What is the oldest human ancestor in the fossil record?
quiz_questions.explanation: Mind-blowing that humans started taking shape so long ago

quiz_questions.q: What do the Laetoli Footprints represent?
quiz_questions.a: First evidence of walking upright - 3.6 Million years ago

quiz_questions.q: What marks the true shift into modern humans?
quiz_questions.a: Teeth - our teeth are our most notable modern human feature
quiz_questions.explanation: Not a gradual evolution but species mixing, mutants, recombination

quiz_questions.q: What percentage of Neanderthal DNA do most humans have?
quiz_questions.a: 4-6%, except Sub-Saharan Africans who are 100% Homo Sapien
quiz_questions.explanation: Papua New Guinea people also have Denisovan DNA

quiz_questions.q: What did the Malta, Siberia discovery show?
quiz_questions.a: 24,000 years ago Siberians were related to Native Americans
quiz_questions.explanation: Along with Tianyuan cave showing Asia-Native American connection
